name: The Room of Justice
description:
The room has worn-out walls and dimmed lighting. The first thing you see is a message scratched in huge letters on the wall:

"Will justice be served? The lowest number must be sacrificed. Do not lie."

You look around and see a guillotine in the room along 4 puppets to the right of it. Each of the puppets mimic the appearances of the people in the room and have a different number painted in red on them. There is a box to the left of the guillotine with a note saying that everyone has to draw a slip of paper from it. Everyone reaches into the box to grab a slip of paper from inside before going their separate ways.

actions.npc1: %NPC1% is inspecting the guillotine and stroking the side of the blade.
actions.npc2: %NPC2% is drawing patterns on the floor with their finger.
actions.npc3: %NPC3% is leaning against a wall with their arms crossed and eyes closed.

clues.clue1: It seems like you need to choose which puppet to place under the guillotine's blade as the sacrifice. You read your piece of paper first and see that you have puppet %PUPPET1%.

deaths.player: The exit door opens. As you are walking towards the door to the next room, you briefly hear something from the side before a blade slices the air from the side, chopping your neck clean off.
deaths.npc:
The exit door opens. As everyone is walking towards the next room, you hear a noise from behind and you see the head of %DEAD% being sliced by a blade that flew out of nowhere.

It seems like you were the only one who noticed, but maybe it's because everyone else is already traumatized and ignoring what happened. You all proceed into the next room.
